detail_description: THE CLIFF BEACH RESTAURANT SDN BHD (1329221-U) is a stunning culinary destination that combines Malay, Asian, and Western flavors with breathtaking views of the Andaman Sea. With its contemporary design and outdoor seating offering panoramic sunset views, it's an ideal spot for any celebration or romantic dinner. The restaurant's open-air indoor dining area features modern furnishings and classy decor, providing an unforgettable dining experience.
name: THE CLIFF BEACH RESTAURANT SDN BHD (1329221-U)
address: Lot 63 & 40, Cenang, Mukim Kedawang, Lebuh Pantai, 07000 Pulau Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

excerpt: Laid-back option for light American & European eats, including vegan & gluten-free items.
detail_description: Red Tomato Langkawi offers a relaxed atmosphere and a diverse menu featuring American and European cuisine, with options for vegans and those with gluten-free diets. The restaurant's vibrant decor resembles a Spanish hacienda, complete with colorful walls, stained-glass pendant lamps, and unique decorative elements like bird cages and cactus pots. Known for serving some of the best Western food on the island, it is a popular breakfast spot renowned for its sweet banana pancakes.
name: Red Tomato Langkawi
address: No. 5 Casa Fina, Jalan Pantai Cenang, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Orkid Ria Seafood Restaurant is a Chinese open-air eatery located on Jalan Pantai Cenang, offering a delightful experience for seafood enthusiasts. The restaurant is known for its delectable chilli crab and steamed tilapia. Visitors appreciate the fusion of locally grown produce with fresh seafood to create inspiring blackboard specials.
name: Orkid Ria Seafood Restaurant
address: Lot 418, Jalan Pantai Tengah, Jl. Teluk Baru, Mukim Kedawang, 07100 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Wonderland Food Store is a popular open-air restaurant known for its budget-friendly and delicious seafood, as well as chicken and vegetable dishes prepared in Chinese style. The casual atmosphere and great value for money have made it a hit among both locals and tourists. Diners highly recommend the softshell crab with salted egg yolk, butter prawns, and steamed grouper dish. The friendly staff provide helpful recommendations on choosing the best seafood options, ensuring a satisfying dining experience.
name: Wonderland Food Store
address: 179;181, 07000, 180, Persiaran Mutiara 2, Pusat Perdagangan Kelana Mas, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Haroo Korean Restaurant is a must-visit for authentic and delicious Korean food in Langkawi. The portions are generous, and the food is flavorful without being too heavy or oily. The service is top-notch, with accommodating staff who go the extra mile to ensure a great dining experience. The menu offers a variety of options, including vegetarian and vegan dishes that are prepared with fresh ingredients.
name: Haroo Korean Restaurant
address: Lot 31, Jalan Pantai Tengah, Jl. Teluk Baru, Mukim kedawang, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Yellow Beach Cafe, located in the sought-after area of Pantai Cenang, Langkawi, offers a vibrant and inviting beachside dining experience. The cafe boasts a cheerful yellow-themed decor and provides a diverse menu with options ranging from main dishes, pizzas, and salads to an array of beverages and desserts. Additionally, the cafe caters to various dietary preferences including vegan options. Guests can also enjoy shisha offerings at this lively establishment.
name: Yellow Beach Cafe
address: Jalan Pantai Cenang, Pantai Cenang, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Cactus is a hidden gem in Langkawi, offering a variety of delicious Malaysian dishes. The restaurant provides friendly service and an authentic dining experience. Diners recommend trying the deep-fried calamari, sizzling beef, and ABC barracuda. The menu features a great selection of dishes, and the staff is always accommodating. Visitors praise the fresh and reasonably priced food at Cactus, making it a must-visit spot for those traveling to Langkawi.
name: Cactus Restaurant
address: Lot 1698, Jalan Pantai Tengah, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Yasmin Syrian Restaurant المطعم السوري ياسمين is a newly opened dining spot located across from Orchid Ria. The restaurant offers an intimate atmosphere and attentive service, ensuring that your meal arrives promptly, often before you can finish a glass of freshly squeezed mango or pineapple juice. The open kitchen allows diners to interact with the kitchen staff, who are eager to please.
name: Yasmin Syrian Restaurant المطعم السوري ياسمين
address: Pantai cenang, Kampung Lubok Buaya, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Fat Cupid - Cafe & Restaurant is a hidden gem near Tengah beach, offering a peaceful and beautiful atmosphere under the trees. The friendly staff provides great advice and service, making it perfect for groups. The food is veggie-loaded, with dishes like Laksa filled with long beans and tau geh. While the kuah may be on the heavier side, the beef hor fun is a treat for beef lovers with its large slices of beef.
name: FatCupid - Cafe & Restaurant
address: Lot 2273, Kampung Tasek Anak, La Pari-Pari Resort, Jalan Pantai Tengah, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: "Pia's the Padi" is a charming restaurant that offers a fusion of Malay, Indian, Chinese, and international cuisine. The ambiance is enhanced by beautiful decor and water features, creating a delightful dining experience. Guests can enjoy top-quality, fresh, and flavorful dishes such as pakoras and beef rendang. The friendly service adds to the welcoming atmosphere.
name: Pia's the Padi
address: Jalan Ulu Melaka, Kampung Padang Gaong, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Bambooba Bistro Langkawi is a fantastic place to unwind and enjoy delicious food at reasonable prices. The staff is friendly and accommodating, ensuring a pleasant dining experience. With indoor and outdoor seating, it offers a comfortable atmosphere for patrons to relax. Guests can also engage in activities like playing pool or darts while enjoying vibrant drinks. The bistro's menu features homemade sandwiches, comfort food, freshly made pizzas, burgers, salads, and delightful desserts like chocolate cake.
name: Bambooba Bistro langkawi
address: No, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Putumayo Restaurant is a popular choice along the touristy strip in Langkawi, known for its open-air terrace that creates a relaxed and laid-back atmosphere, perfect for enjoying afternoon Tiger beers. The restaurant stands out for its excellent service and inviting ambiance. For those seeking an evening dining experience, Red Sky is another option nearby, offering a variety of curries. However, Putumayo's atmosphere and service make it a standout choice.
name: Putumayo Restaurant 复古海滨餐厅
address: Pantai Chenang, Lot 1584, Jalan Pantai Chenang, Mukim Kedawang, 07000 Pulau Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: India Palace Restaurant in Pantai Cenang offers a delightful dining experience with warm and friendly service. The ambiance is inviting, and the staff ensures that every guest has an incredible time. The food is delicious, especially the Gobi65 with mint chutney and well-cooked Masala dishes. Vegetarian options are also available, making it a must-visit for those seeking charming atmosphere and good Indian cuisine.
name: India Palace Restaurant
address: 2, Jalan Pantai Chenang, Kampung Lubok Buaya, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Gallo Nero Italian Restaurant is a fabulous dining spot on Langkawi Island, offering authentic and exquisite Italian dishes. The food is fresh, flavorful, and truly divine. The friendly and professional staff provide attentive service, with the head chef occasionally greeting patrons. The menu goes beyond pasta and pizza to include delicious options like tuna steak and tender lamb shank. While some dishes may have minor imperfections, the overall experience is wonderful and memorable for anyone seeking fine Italian dining in Langkawi.
name: Gallo Nero Italian Restaurant
address: 19, Bandar, Jalan Padang Matsirat, Kampung Padang Mat Sirat, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Planter's at The Danna Langkawi offers a delightful international breakfast buffet with bottomless sparkling wine, making it an ideal way to kick off your day in Langkawi. The buffet features a mix of local and international delicacies, including nasi lemak, roti canai, porridges, as well as standard Western fare and cold plates with a variety of hams and cheeses. Guests have praised the splendid breakfast spread and the attentive staff.
name: Planter's at The Danna Langkawi
address: The Danna Langkawi, Telaga Harbour Park, Pantai Kok, 07000, Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia, 07000 Langkawi, Malaysia

detail_description: Maroush Restaurant, situated in Pantai Cenang, stands out among other Indian and Arabic cuisine spots due to the owner's philosophy of treating all customers with equal attention. The restaurant offers a delightful dinner experience with its cool ambiance and convenient location near various attractions. While the prices may be slightly high, the excellent service compensates for it.
name: Maroush Restaurant
address: Lot 6&7, Landcon Resort, Jalan Pantai Chenang, Kampung Lubok Buaya, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Jala Restaurant is a captivating dining spot with an exotic ambiance and delectable cuisine. The menu features a la carte options, including the fresh catch of the day, which can be prepared to your preference and served with two sauces and three side dishes. The skilled chefs are known for suggesting the best cooking method based on the fish's flavor profile and texture. Guests praise the excellent service and recommend trying dishes like deep-fried and grilled red snapper.
name: Jala Restaurant
address: The Andaman Langkawi, Jln Teluk Datai, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Telaga Seafood Restaurant is a top choice for those seeking the best dining experience in Langkawi. Nestled in the midst of Pantai Cenang, this restaurant offers a serene tropical atmosphere shielded by lush foliage. The menu features a variety of Western and local dishes, including seafood delights like grilled fish, prawns, and crabs. Guests can enjoy their meals while taking in the stunning sea views.
name: Telaga Seafood Restaurant
address: Jalan Pantai Chenang, Kampung Lubok Buaya, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

excerpt: Asian, Western & other global fare, plus cocktails, in a contemporary setup with outdoor seating.
detail_description: Red Sky Restaurant & Bar offers a diverse menu featuring Asian, Western, and global cuisine along with a variety of cocktails in a modern setting that includes outdoor seating. It is popular among both locals and tourists for casual lunches or evening gatherings. The restaurant provides indoor and outdoor seating as well as a full bar for enjoying cocktails. Guests can enjoy an extensive selection of appetizers and main courses representing flavors from Malaysia, Mexico, India, and Continental Cuisine.
name: Red Sky Restaurant & Bar
address: Red Sky @ Villa Molek Jalan Teluk Baru, Jalan Pantai Tengah, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

name: Scarborough Fish & Chips- Tanjung Rhu
address: Lot 1388, Jalan Tanjung Rhu, Mukim Air Hangat, 07100 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia
